full_text: The United States of Charmin. Not the red packaging…the blue packaging. https://t.co/xRzx7bfjqI

Johan’s shoulder was probably a ticking time bomb, using him as defense in your argument about Kershaw isn’t relevant. Due to his shoulder condition it was gonna go sooner or later, at least he got a no-no out of it. Like Mattingly’s back—he rode it until he couldn’t anymore.
Not many players have the bat speed to do what Guerrero just did. My goodness.
